parser.epilog: If no arguments are provided, help will be shown, and you will be prompted to launch the GUI.
song_artist_file_path_help: Path to the text file containing <song-artist> each line.
datapack_id_file_path_help: Path to the text file containing Datapack IDs each line. / Path to the datapack directory.
output_path_help: Optional path to the output directory. Defaults to the current working directory.
--gui_help: Run the application with a GUI.
duration_file_help: Path to a text file containing duration (seconds) per line, matching songs line by line.
correct_format_example:
The format should be:
python midiplayer.pyz <Song-Artist TextFile> <DatapackID TextFile / Datapack Directory> [JSON Output Path] [-d DurationFile]
gui.title: MidiPlayer: songs.json Export Helper
gui.label_datapack: Datapack ID Preview (Press Enter to preview)
gui.select_datapack_file: Select Datapack/ID text file (use dropdown for file type)
gui.notice_msg:
1. Song-Artist box and Datapack ID box correspond line by line.

2. Song-Artist format per line:
    <Song Name> - [Artist1, Artist2, ...]
3. Datapack IDs must not contain spaces.

4. Importing zip datapacks auto-calculates song duration.
